channel.title: How to remove qubes-core-agent-passwordless-root safely in qubes whonix template
channel.description: Hi,I tried to remove qubes-core-agent-passwordless-root in whonix workstation template, but apt says"The following packages will be REMOVED: qubes-core-agent-passwordless-root qubes-whonix-gateway qubes-whonix-shared-packages-recommended" Will this breaks the template? How should I safely remove passwordless root?

item.title: How to remove qubes-core-agent-passwordless-root safely in qubes whonix template
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: How to remove qubes-core-agent-passwordless-root safely in qubes whonix template

Closing.

item.title: How to remove qubes-core-agent-passwordless-root safely in qubes whonix template
item.dc:creator: whonixwhonix
item.description:
Hi,I tried to remove qubes-core-agent-passwordless-root in whonix workstation template, but apt says"The following packages will be REMOVED:
qubes-core-agent-passwordless-root qubes-whonix-gateway
qubes-whonix-shared-packages-recommended"
Will this breaks the template? How should I safely remove passwordless root?

Read full topic
